hero.intro: Hello, I'm Jos√© Ram√≠rez, a JR Front‚ÄëEnd developer from Luque, Paraguay.
hero.age: I am currently {{edad}} years old and in my third year majoring in Computer Science at Universidad Americana. I am a level C2 English speaker, which allows me to communicate, speak, develop code and write pretty well :).

projects.title: MERN Stack Store
projects.desc: An online store built with MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js. It's a prototype shop where users can browse products, add to cart and place orders.

projects.title: Minecraft Clone with React & Three.js
projects.desc: A web-based Minecraft clone using React and Three.js. Users can interact with game blocks, build structures and enjoy basic gameplay features.

projects.title: Travel Journal in Paraguay
projects.desc: A Paraguay travel journal highlighting tourist spots, gastronomy and cultural insights about the country.

projects.title: Tenzies Dice Game
projects.desc: A classic dice game built with React. Users roll dice and accumulate points in this fun implementation of Tenzies.

itIntern.review: Beyond technical tasks, I gained Microsoft Office skills, learned collaborative work methodologies, improved my project organization abilities, and developed the diligence needed to fulfill assigned tasks.
itIntern.title: IT Intern
responsibilities: Learned Linux Bash and Powershell commands.
Installed, repaired, and configured desktop computers.
Collaborated in a team to solve technical issues.
Performed maintenance on RJ45 cables and connectors.
Developed and deepened my soft skills.
